short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extension to focus for reading the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that helps you focus while browsing the internet, just click on the element you want to focus, and click again to revert.

Support switching between focus mode and normal mode.

The extension uses jQuery to hide elements apart from the one that has been clicked.

Source code: https://github.com/utsabc/focus

This extension does not collect any data about your browsing
